page.title: 03ASHILL VILLAGERS EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the employed people work outside the village.{Watton, Swaffham, {Thetford, E. Dereham & Norwich}being the usual places of employment. Inside the village the 3 larger farms employ a few men each. The engineering shop has 5 employees and the plant hire company employs about 15. Several people work within the building trade, quite often self employed. The men employed on the farms enjoy a friendly relationship with their employers and disputes are generally unheard of. Further afield factories at{Thetford are a large source of employment, several area reps of large companies live in the village and the local military establishments (mainly airfields) mean there are several servicemen. A new prison at{Griston has just caused an influx of "warders" etc.
